recommended_degree: Manajemen Sumber Daya Manusia, Administrasi Bisnis, Administrasi Pajak, Akuntansi Manajemen, Manajemen Ekonomi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Support BPJS Kesehatan & BPJS Ketenagakerjaan administration processes
2. Maintain and update tax status information (store level)							
3. Validate employee NIK in Coretax system								
4. Prepare employee letters and administrative support
